  "description": "Whoosh NG is an thriving logistics business with one of the best operations processes, structure and outlook in the SME category in Lagos State. Employment Type: Full-time
Start Date: Immediate
Hybrid &ndash; 3 days in office, 2 days remote

Job Summary


	Are you creative, social media-savvy, and passionate about content and community? We&rsquo;re looking for a Social Media Manager to grow our brand presence, engage our audience, and bring fresh ideas to life across multiple platforms.


What You&#39;ll Do


	Create and manage content calendars for Instagram, Facebook, Twitter/X, LinkedIn, TikTok, etc.
	Develop engaging and on-brand content (graphics, videos, captions, etc.)
	Monitor and respond to messages, comments, and trends in real time
	Analyze performance metrics and provide monthly reports
	Collaborate with marketing, design, and customer service teams
	Stay up-to-date with industry trends and platform updates


Requirements


	1 - 2 years of experience in social media management or content creation
	Strong communication skills and a creative eye
	Basic knowledge of Canva, CapCut, or other design/video tools
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
	Passion for storytelling, branding, and digital trends


Nice to Have:


	Experience with paid social campaigns
	Photography or video editing skills
	Previous work in a fast-paced startup or agency environment.


Why Join Us?


	Salary: N100,000 - N150,000 Monthly.
	A hybrid work model for flexibility
	Opportunity to grow with a dynamic team
	Creative freedom and ownership of your work
	Fun, collaborative work culture


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV,&nbsp;social media handles, and a short cover note to:&nbsp;careers@whoosh.com.ng&nbsp;using &quot;Social Media Manager Application&quot; as the subject of the mail.",

Social Media Manager Job at Whoosh Logistics




        
    

        
        Whoosh NG is an thriving logistics business with one of the best operations processes, structure and outlook in the SME category in Lagos State. Having been in business for three years, Whoosh NG has fulfilled more than 20,000 deliveries locally and globally. However, Whoosh NG is evolving from the conventional business space to become a Logistics Technology Company

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Start Date: Immediate
Hybrid – 3 days in office, 2 days remote

Job Summary
     

            
    




	Are you creative, social media-savvy, and passionate about content and community? We’re looking for a Social Media Manager to grow our brand presence, engage our audience, and bring fresh ideas to life across multiple platforms.


What You'll Do


	Create and manage content calendars for Instagram, Facebook, Twitter/X, LinkedIn, TikTok, etc.
	Develop engaging and on-brand content (graphics, videos, captions, etc.)
	Monitor and respond to messages, comments, and trends in real time
	Analyze performance metrics and provide monthly reports
	Collaborate with marketing, design, and customer service teams
	Stay up-to-date with industry trends and platform updates


Requirements


	1 - 2 years of experience in social media management or content creation
	Strong communication skills and a creative eye
	Basic knowledge of Canva, CapCut, or other design/video tools
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
	Passion for storytelling, branding, and digital trends


Nice to Have:


	Experience with paid social campaigns
	Photography or video editing skills
	Previous work in a fast-paced startup or agency environment.


Why Join Us?


	Salary: N100,000 - N150,000 Monthly.
	A hybrid work model for flexibility
	Opportunity to grow with a dynamic team
	Creative freedom and ownership of your work
	Fun, collaborative work culture


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, social media handles, and a short cover note to: careers@whoosh.com.ng using "Social Media Manager Application" as the subject of the mail.

  "description": "Kaplo Africa - Our client, a top Pharmaceutical company committed to promotive healthcare and disease prevention among vulnerable populations, is&nbsp;recruiting a highly skilled, experienced, and results-driven candidate&nbsp;to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operations Manager (Pharmaceuticals)

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;

Job Summary


	The Operations Manager will oversee and optimize daily operations, drive efficiency, and ensure seamless delivery of healthcare products and services.


Key Responsibilities


	Coordinate and supervise all operational activities across departments
	Ensure timely distribution and availability of health products and diagnostics
	Develop and implement efficient systems, SOPs, and KPIs to drive productivity
	Liaise with internal teams and external partners to support growth targets
	Ensure regulatory compliance and quality control across operations
	Monitor budgets, resources, and inventory to reduce wastage and maximize ROI.


Requirements


	Proven experience in operations management (preferably in healthcare or pharmaceutical sectors)
	Strong leadership, planning, and problem-solving skills
	Excellent communication and team coordination abilities
	Knowledge of supply chain, inventory, and regulatory standards
	Results-oriented with a passion for impactful healthcare delivery.


Salary
N350,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;kaploafrica@gmail.com&nbsp;using &ldquo;Operations Manager (Pharmaceuticals) &ndash; Abuja&rdquo; as the subject of the email.
